#imports
import math

#metadata
metadata = {
    'protocolName': 'Four 96-well to 384-well transfer',
     'author': 'Consuela <Consuelajobe@eurofinsus.com>',
    'source': 'Custom Protocol',
    'apiLevel': '2.10'
}
 
 
def run (protocol):

    # load labware and pipettes
    #Labware
    tiprack = [protocol.load_labware('opentrons_96_tiprack_20ul',slot) for slot in ['2','5','6','9']]
    src_plate = [protocol.load_labware('biorad_96_wellplate_200ul_pcr',slot, f'src plate {i}') for i, 
    slot in enumerate (['1','4','7','10'], 1)]
    dest_plate = protocol.load_labware('corning_384_wellplate_112ul_flat', '3')

    #pipette
    right_pipette=protocol.load_instrument('p20_multi_gen2','right',tip_racks=tiprack)


  #Get columns
    columns = math.ceil(384/8)

    #Get sample and destination wells in correct order
    src_wells = [well for i in range(4) for well in src_plate[i].rows()[0]][:columns]
    pcr_dest = [dest_plate.rows()[0], dest_plate.rows()[1]][:columns]

    #add samples
    transfer_volume = 2
    right_pipette.transfer(transfer_volume, src_wells, pcr_dest, new_tip='always')

labware.name: Corning 384 Well Plate 112 µL Flat on 3
